This is the website of the **Statistica III** course (6 CFU) of the "*Corso di Laurea Triennale in Scienze Statistiche ed Economiche* (SSE)", Università degli Studi di Milano-Bicocca. **Statistica III** is a monographic course on [Generalized Linear Models]{.blue} (GLMs).

This is a [B.Sc.-level]{.orange} course, but there are some prerequisites: it is assumed that you have already been exposed to:

  - [Simple linear regression and descriptive statistics]{.blue}, e.g. from [_Statistica I_](https://tommasorigon.github.io/StatI/);
  - [Inferential statistics]{.orange}, e.g. from _Statistica II_;
  - [Linear models]{.grey}, e.g. from _Analisi Statistica Multivariata_ and _Econometria_;
  - [R software]{.grey}, e.g. from [_Analisi Statistica Multivariata_](https://tommasorigon.github.io/introR/).

Regression is such an important topic that the [tour]{.orange} will [continue]{.orange} at  [Data Mining](https://tommasorigon.github.io/datamining/).


## Teaching material

#### Recommended textbooks (ITA)

- Salvan, A., Sartori, N. and L. Pace. 2020. [*Modelli Lineari Generalizzati*](https://doi.org/10.1007/978-88-470-3995-7_10). Springer.
- Azzalini, A. 2008. [*Inferenza Statistica: Una Presentazione Basata sul Concetto di Verosimiglianza*](https://link.springer.com/book/9788847001305). Springer

    
#### Recommended textbooks (ENG)

- Agresti, A. 2015. [*Foundations of Linear and Generalized Linear Models*](https://www.wiley.com/en-us/Foundations+of+Linear+and+Generalized+Linear+Models-p-9781118730034). Wiley.
- McCullagh, P., and J. A. Nelder. 1989. [*Generalized Linear Models*](https://www.taylorfrancis.com/books/mono/10.1201/9780203753736/generalized-linear-models-mccullagh). Second Edition. Springer.
